definitions.definition: The system of fear and intimidation put into place during the Reign of Terror in Revolutionary France around 1793-94.
The use of unlawful violence against people or property to achieve political objectives .

subdefinitions.definition: The use of intimidation or bullying tactics.

main_definition: ( historical ) The system of fear and intimidation put into place during the Reign of Terror in Revolutionary France around 1793-94.
secondary_definitions: The use of unlawful violence against people or property to achieve political objectives .
